nodes.text: Wormtown was an area of the Hutt Space moon Nar Shaddaa that contained the pit fighting Garkata Fighting Arena. Boba Fett traveled to the town during the Galactic Civil War to eliminate Wyrmen Lictor, the champion of the arena. During Fett's fights, he also killed the combatant Jonny the Sting, who was considered a favorite among Wormtown residents. After Lictor was killed at the bounty hunter's hands, Rebel Alliance agents Luke Skywalker, Chewbacca, and the droids R2-D2 and C-3PO traveled to Wormtown in search of Fett and came into conflict with the Kanji Criminal Enterprise.
